Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.graph

Class EpistemicEdge

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.graph.Edge
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.graph.EpistemicEdge
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class EpistemicEdge extends Edge
An epistemic edge is an edge whose parent is some world state and whose child represents the beliefs of the edge's character. In other words, when the world is in the parent state, the edge's character believes the world is in the child state. The edge's label is the character.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware
